been making steady progress each day since she was wounded last weekend. Then Wednesday night- with her closest friends from Congress holding her hand- Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes for the first time. It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. "She wanted us to know that she was with us a hundred percent and understood everything we were saying."
